ä½†æ˜¯ golang ä¹‹ä¸­åªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ for å¾ªç¯ï¼Œç°åœ¨æœ‰äº†æ³›å‹ï¼Œè®©å®ç° map, reduce å˜çš„ç®€å•äº†ï¼Œ ç›¸æ¯”ä½¿ç”¨ interfaceï¼Œæ€§èƒ½ä¹Ÿæ›´å¥½ã€‚

ä»£ç å®ç°ï¼š

func Map[T any, R any](ts []T, f func(T) R) []R {
	nt := make([]R, 0, len(ts))
	for _, t := range ts {
		nt = append(nt, f(t))
	}
	return nt
}

func Reduce[T any](ts []T, f func(T, T) T, init T) T {
	t := init
	for _, tt := range ts {
		t = f(t, tt)
	}
	return t
}

ä½¿ç”¨

type Person struct {
    ID   int
    Name string
}

personList := []Person{
    { 1,"zhangsan"},
    { 2,"lisi"},
}

names := Map(personList, func(p Person) string { return p.Name })
fmt.Println(names) // [zhangsan lisi]

nums := []int{1,2,3,4}
total := Reduce(nums, func(a, b int) int {
    return a+b
}, 0)
fmt.Println(total) // 10
